## Ingredients

- *(250/3)*g butter
- 200g dark chocolate
- 6 Tsp sugar
- 6 eggs
- 1 tsp soluble coffee

## Preparation

1. Start melting the butter and chocolate together
2. Seperate whites and yolks
3. Beat the whites until stiff and put them aside
4. Beat the yolks with the sugar and coffee
5. Make sure the chocolate and butter are melted and stired together
6. Add the chocolate mixture to the yolk mixture and mix
7. Carefully mix the stiffened egg whites
8. Store in the fridge
